item.title: Butter Chicken with ðŸ‡®ðŸ‡³ Ingredients For the garam masala:...
item.description:
Butter Chicken with ðŸ‡®ðŸ‡³ Ingredients For the garam masala: -Green cardamom pods -Black cardamom pods -Cinnamon sticks -Cloves -Black peppercorns -Coriander seeds -Cumin seeds -Fennel seeds -Mace blades -Bay leaf -Star anise -Rose petals -Poppy seeds For the marinade: -Boneless skinless chicken thighs -Thick plain yogurt -Lemon juice -Ginger -Garlic -Kashmiri red chili powder (or deggi mirch) -Ground coriander -Turmeric -Garam masala -Oil -Salt For the butter chicken sauce: Cinnamon stick and cardamom to infuse ghee Ghee Ginger Garlic Tomatoes (passata, crushed, or fresh) Kashmiri red chili powder (or deggi mirch) Ground cumin Ground coriander Garam masala (from the blend below) Dried fenugreek Heavy cream Salt Butter For the naan: -Atta or AP Flour -Yeast -Sugar -Warm milk -Yogurt -Egg
